title: Best BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['500g tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', 'salt and pepper to taste']
